api_list.name: Genres
api_list.description: Returns a list of Netflix genres
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unogsng.p.rapidapi.com/genres"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unogsng.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

results.genre: Ciencia ficci\u00f3n y fantas\u00eda para TV
Dramas basados en la vida real
Romantic Films based on a book
Japanese TV Shows Based on Comics
Anime based on a Video Game

api_list.name: Countries
api_list.description: Returns list of available Netflix countries (includes uNoGS country id)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://unogsng.p.rapidapi.com/countries"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "unogsng.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Images
api_list.description: Pull all the images associated with a particular title

api_list.name: Title Countries
api_list.description: Get all countries associated with a particular Netflix ID

api_list.name: Title Genres
api_list.description: Get all genres associated with a particular Netflix ID

api_list.name: Title Details
api_list.description: Specific information for a given Netflix title

results.title: Hot Gimmick: Girl Meets Boy
results.synopsis: A quiet teen's life is shaken up when she's forced to be her arrogant neighbor's slave. He loves her, but they both have a lot to learn about trust.
results.imdbplot: Hatsumi and her family live normal lives until she is used by Ryoki who begins to bully and intimidate her. Azusa is a friend in the area and also good looking. He has the hots for Hatsumi ...

api_list.name: Expiring

required_parameters.name: countrylist
required_parameters.description: List of uNoGS country IDs separated by a ,

api_list.name: People
api_list.description: Search for Netflix People by name (returns person id for searches)

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: A persons name First Last or Both

api_list.name: Episodes
api_list.description: Search for Netflix People by name (returns person id for searches)

episodes.title: Special: Christmas 1987
episodes.synopsis: Fry and Laurie play verbose TV critics, irritating businessmen Gordon and Stuart, and the confused characters of an Australian soap opera.

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.synopsis: The premiere episode kicks off with Fry as a put-upon headmaster and Laurie as a puritanical parent who wants to exchange his 'soiled' son.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.synopsis: A cad of a talk show host gets his desserts, and we meet the very pleasant and expositional commander of the MI-5.

episodes.title: Episode 3
episodes.synopsis: Fry steals Laurie's brain as a practical joke, but Laurie never notices. A pleasant Greek lunch is spoiled by Laurie's insecurity and low self-esteem.

episodes.title: Episode 4
episodes.synopsis: Several of the sketches are canceled after an audience member claims that they are his stolen intellectual property. A teen poet helps his headmaster.

episodes.title: Episode 5
episodes.synopsis: Two TV critics come to deride the show. A lesbian-obsessed lawyer and a couple who baptize their infant for business reasons provide critical fodder.

episodes.title: Episode 6
episodes.synopsis: The pleasant boys from MI-5 are back to treat each other with love, and the taxation minister is heckled by none other than Tony of Plymouth.

api_list.name: Deleted
api_list.description: Returns all title which have been deleted meeting a limited criteria

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: returns anything deleted after this date

optional_parameters.name: countrylist
optional_parameters.description: list of uNoGS country ID's separated by a ,

results.title: UFOs: The Best Evidence Ever (Caught on Tape)
Breaking the Magician's Code: Magic's Biggest Secrets Finally Revealed
Conspiracy Theory: Did We Land On The Moon?
Stretch and Bobbito: Radio That Changed Lives
Joseph Campbell and the Power of Myth
Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
The Man Who Knew Too Little
The Phantom of the Opera: Special Edition
The Blue Planet: A Natural History of the Oceans

api_list.name: Search
api_list.description: Search for Netflix titles based on a variety of parameters

optional_parameters.name: query
optional_parameters.description: any string you want to search (fulltext against the title)

optional_parameters.name: countrylist
optional_parameters.description: list of uNoGS country ID's (from country endpoint) leave blank for all country search

optional_parameters.name: newdate
optional_parameters.description: returns all titles with a new date greater than this

optional_parameters.name: genrelist
optional_parameters.description: list of Netflix genre id's (see genre endpoint for list)

results.title: Call the Midwife
results.synopsis: This period drama set in impoverished East London in the 1950s follows a newly qualified midwife and her colleagues at a nursing convent.

results.title: Extras
results.synopsis: Grasping hungrily for stardom, bit actor Andy Millman and his pal Maggie spend their days chasing after work as film and TV extras.

results.title: Oasis: Supersonic
results.synopsis: This film details the rise of British rock group Oasis and the creativity and chaos that brothers Noel and Liam Gallagher brought to the iconic band.

results.title: Episodes
results.synopsis: Hoping to create an American version of their hit British sitcom, two screenwriters run into cultural obstacles, starting with the lead character.

results.title: Ex Machina
results.synopsis: A coder at a tech company wins a week-long retreat at the compound of his company's CEO, where he's tasked with testing a new artificial intelligence.

results.title: 20 Feet from Stardom
results.synopsis: Winner of the 2014 Academy Award for Best Documentary Feature, this film takes a look at the world of backup vocalists and the legends they support.

results.title: Blue Ruin
results.synopsis: Bad news from the past unhinges vagabond Dwight Evans, sending him on a mission of bloody retribution that takes him to his childhood hometown.

results.title: Kill the Messenger
results.synopsis: In the 1980s, a crusading journalist uncovers secret CIA funding for Nicaraguan rebels, but the powers that be silence his investigation.

results.title: Bloodsport
results.synopsis: Army captain Frank Dux goes AWOL and travels to Hong Kong on a quest to become the champion of a secret, dangerous martial arts contest.

results.title: Drillbit Taylor
results.synopsis: Three high school freshmen devise a novel plan for dealing with the school bully: They hire an ex-soldier turned beach bum as a bodyguard.

results.title: Good Burger
results.synopsis: Two L.A. teens with summer jobs at Good Burger try to save their small restaurant when a corporate giant burger franchise moves in across the street.

results.title: Carrie
results.synopsis: This remake of the classic 1976 horror flick finds misfit Carrie getting revenge on all the cool people who've bullied her over the years.

results.title: The Monster
results.synopsis: A troubled mother-daughter relationship faces the ultimate test when the duo’s broken-down car leaves them trapped within reach of a vicious creature.

results.title: The Humanity Bureau
results.synopsis: In a dystopian, near-future United States, a deportation caseworker who has begun to question authority tries to safeguard a woman and her young son.

results.title: Mercy Black
results.synopsis: Fifteen years after a traumatic crime, a woman is released from psychiatric care and tries to drive out an evil spirit that continues to haunt her.

results.title: Thriller
results.synopsis: When a prank goes wrong, a shy kid from Compton is sent away for murder. Four years later, he’s back and out for revenge on homecoming weekend.

results.title: Norm of the North: Keys to the Kingdom
results.synopsis: When Norm the polar bear is framed for a crime he didn’t commit, his friends step up to help him clear his name.
